channel.title: Code To Make Yourself Female In Moparscape
channel.description: What Is The Code You Use In A Character To Make Them Female? The Place I Want To Use The Code Is In The Characters Folder In The Hybrid Folder Of The Moparscape Folder.

item.title: Code To Make Yourself Female In Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @minerscape.hopto.org minerscape.hopto.org
item.description:
@minerscape.hopto.org wrote:

thx anyways[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 12:14:03 AM[/size][hr][quote="_Vengeance, post:4, topic:185644"]Just because you aren’t using capitals, doesn’t mean you should disregard spelling.[/quote]
get off my back i spelled 1 word wrong and didnt notice omfg :mad:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 12:15:56 AM[/size][hr]

} if (command.startsWith("female")) { sendMessage("You're now a girl..."); pHead = 50; pTorso = 57; pArms = 62; pHands = 68; pLegs = 72; pFeet = 80; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
where would i put this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 01:15:04 AM[/size][hr]anyone know?

Read full topic

item.title: Code To Make Yourself Female In Moparscape

item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

minerscape.hopto.org:

What Is The Code You Use In A Character To Make Them Female? The Place I Want To Use The Code Is In The Characters Folder In The Hybrid Folder Of The Moparscape Folder.

Why dont you just use ::char ? or is that what your trying to get?
Anyways here:

} if (command.startsWith("female")) { sendMessage("You're now a girl..."); pHead = 50; pTorso = 57; pArms = 62; pHands = 68; pLegs = 72; pFeet = 80; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
